meanings.definition: A person or thing that names.
meanings.sent1: The namers in the class were responsible for choosing the team name.
meanings.sent2: The namers at the company had the important task of labeling all the files.
meanings.sent3: The namers at the zoo decided to name the new baby giraffe 'Spotty'.
meanings.sent4: The namers in the town were like magicians, giving everything a special identity.
meanings.sent5: The namers in the storybook had the power to bring characters to life with their words.

meanings.sent1: The namers gathered together to discuss the best names for the puppies.
meanings.sent2: The namers unanimously agreed on the name for the new park.
meanings.sent3: The namers threw a party to celebrate their successful naming of the streets.
meanings.sent4: The namers' creativity knew no bounds when it came to naming the planets.
meanings.sent5: The namers' influence spread far and wide as their chosen names became popular.
